channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Percy is upset to find construction is not finished, so Thomas helps him with the work.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Daisy wants to make sure Mr. Crocodile gets a visit from the tooth fairy in 'Tooth On The Loose', then in 'Scaredy Croc', everyone is scared to fetch Martin's gloves from his spooky shed.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets a new puppy that makes her cat Lucky jealous in 'A Dog For Dora', then in 'Super Pozole', today is the championship game, but all of Dora's friends have a cold.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A talking Mini Patrol go on a wild adventure in 'Pups Save a Talkative Mini Patrol', then in 'Pups Save the History of Adventure Bay', Humdinger steals an ancient book.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A winter ice storm is causing trouble in 'Pups and the Big Freeze', then in 'Pups Save a Basketball Game', Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdinger's Basketball team to a game. But she has no team.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Grace and her long-haired Dachshund, Teddy, as they join The Real Pup Squad! The local caf? hasn't received its food delivery.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help show off River's photography when 'The Crew Builds An Art Museum', then in 'The Crew Builds A Giant Alphorn', an opera-singing goat goes missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Blaze and his friends have renewable energy engines! And when the Gas Guzzler steals everyone's gas, they'll have to use renewable energy to finish the race.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The bunnies discover a haunted house in 'Ghosts!', and then in 'The Gobbler!', the team goes undercover at a Gala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: After the disappearance of Mrs Fotheringill, Mrs Elf becomes the twins' new teacher.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: When Captain Squid leaves his treasure map in the Little Kingdom, Redbeard the Elf Pirate leads Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum on a treasure hunt.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: When Tommy enters his first Rocket Race, Tim does all he can to support his brother.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora finds a new shell for a hermit crab in 'Crabby Boots', then in 'Papi's Picnic Party', Dora delivers the ingredients for Papi's quesadillas.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Judy finds her inner hero on a camping trip in 'Paddington's Race Against the Storm', then in 'Paddington's Super Snail', Paddington befriends a speedy snail with a heroic future ahead.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: It's cousin time. Bakey, Flakey, Marshapan and Paddycake visit Cakey and the dollhouse gang for a sprinkle-rific day of yummy snacks and hug attacks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is on a play date with Candy Cat at Mr Cat's Cafe. Candy show Mr Cat the drawings they've done of everyone, and he hangs them up for everyone to see.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Peppa decides to walk up the big hill during their family hike in the countryside, Daddy Pig assures her that the hard climb will be worth it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: On a cold day, Daddy Pig suggests they build a den until Mummy Pig has finished work. After a hard day's work, the cushion den is a perfect place to watch TV together.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Auntie, Uncle Pig and cousin Chloe are coming for dinner and Peppa is allowed to join too! Peppa is very proud of staying up late - she even stayed up later than the Daddies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and family are watching TV. until it breaks! While Grampy Rabbit fixes it, the family get a new TV which can do everything. but it doesn't beat their old TV.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: During playgroup, Madame Gazelle takes everyone outside to play Parachute Games.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: A storm cancels Peppa and her family's adventure plans so they decide to take it inside. Using their imagination, they go sledding, climb a mountain and have a campfire in the attic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig show Peppa and George how to play Flying Discs in the park. Soon their friends appear with their parents.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George are playing in their pool. They help the garden animals cool down but when it rains, the animals are happy and so is Peppa. Rain makes muddy puddles for jumping in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: At playgroup, Madame Gazelle has invited Mr Potato to lead Peppa and her friends in a wonderfully fun musical.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George are in Granny and Grandpa Pig's Garden. Granny's friends are playing folk music! They play music for Grandpa Pig and then Grandpa Pig makes apple juice for everyone.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: First, Peppa and her friends visit the Little Cars play centre, where Miss Rabbit is in charge.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Pig family visit the Kangaroo family in Australia! On their first day they fly into the outback in Mr Kangaroo's aeroplane, have a barbeque and play some cricket with a Koala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: On their second day in Australia the Kangaroo family take the Pig family to the beach where they try out surfing. George shows off his skills when he's out paddling with Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Today the family go to work with Mrs Kangaroo on the Great Barrier Reef. While taking in the beautiful views in Mrs Kangaroo's submarine, they find some special treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The holiday is coming to an end but there's still time to play with a Boomerang and make friends with Mr Wallaby. They all have trouble keeping the boomerang under control, though.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The children make good use of their clubhouse by playing an adventure game, imaginging that there are wild animals outside - even if it is just Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Madame Gazelle is teaching the children fun games to play with paper.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy, Daddy, Peppa and George are going to the seaside. Mummy and Daddy explain clouds to Peppa and George who have a little sing and dance about clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George for a day on his boat. They see Mr. Bull, who's using his digger boat to remove all the rubbish in the river that shouldn't be there.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is playing at Suzy's house and they find out that Granny Sheep is moving in! She transforms the dull spare room and attic into an exotic boudoir and creative studio.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is at Suzy's house and there is a pile of cardboard boxes so, they take them outside to play with. Peppa turns the boxes into a cardboard shop, a spaceship and even a hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Suzy describes a takeaway and the children want to make their own. Together they 'cook' and deliver the pretend takeaways to the parents. They get great reviews too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has an important job to do in 'Paddington's Earth Day Mission', then in 'Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration', everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar? // It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A game between England and Peru causes 'Paddington's Football Dilemma', then in 'Paddington Has To Say Goodbye', it's time for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still one more adventure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The playgroup is visiting the zoo today. Mr Lion then shows them a giant lizard! The children all believe it's a dinosaur.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit pretend to be babies to get Mummy Rabbit's attention. Mummy Rabbit plays along until they admit they are not really babies.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting Cousin Chloe's House to play with Baby Alexander. Peppa learns babies are not like dolls at all, and do lots of things every day.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.desc: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Monkey goes looking for a star for Papa Smurf in 'Reaching for the Stars', then in 'The Dream Team', Handy puts together an A-team to get his jet pack back from Gargamel's hovel.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: The Mighty Pups take on new super-baddie, The Copycat. It'll take all their effort to take down their most formidable foe yet.

channel.desc: Blaze and his pals are gearing up for a big race with brand new tyres! But Crusher tricks Starla, Darington and Stripes into putting on out-of-control silly tyres.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Daisy wants to make sure Mr. Crocodile gets a visit from the tooth fairy in 'Tooth On The Loose', then in 'Scaredy Croc', everyone is scared to fetch Martin's gloves from his spooky shed.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Farmer hires Yippy, Willow's plant, to watch over his crops in 'Farmer's New Pet', and then in 'Spider Smurf, Papa Smurf makes a revitalizing potion that turns him into a spider.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger disguises himself to steal a purple pearl in 'Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger', then in 'Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patroller', Moby swipes the Whale Patroller - and the Pups' vehicles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A submarine is heading for a delicate reef in 'Aqua Pups Save the Reef', then in 'Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid', the Aqua Pups must save the Merpups' golden orb.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Unable to pay the elves, King Thistle has to go to work to earn a coin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Rainbows are a pirate's best friend - if you're looking for a pot of gold. But, if like Captain Squid you are hiding treasure, then rainbows are a pirate's worst enemy.

channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a Unicornasaurus get a magic paintbrush back in 'Unicornasaurus', then in 'The Grumple Games', Dora helps Hearty win the Grumple Games.

channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: When the Pups and Cap'n Turbot camp out under a very rare Magical Mer Moon, magical things begin to happen, and the Paw Patrol is transformed into mer-pups themselves.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Harold, Ladybird, and the Copycat team up, and the three super baddies take the Mighty Pups' mighty meteor! Can the Mighty Pups get it back.

channel.desc: Pups vs The Ruff-Ruff Pack: The Motorcycle Stunt Show comes to town - bringing famed stunt cyclist Wild Cat, and trouble-making cyclists, the Ruff-Ruff Pack. Can the pups stop the baddies.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The children are playing a game of superheroes. When Strawberry takes her supervillain role a bit too far, it is up to Elf Man and Fairy Girl to save the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum help Mrs Witch have a bit of a clear-out. The children bring the magical items back home, but in the wrong hands they cause a few problems.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: It is harvest day. The Elves and fairies enlist the help of Mr Gnome in picking blackberries. If only they could stop him from eating them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Tio Tesoro find his treasure trackers in 'Tio Tesoro's Treasure', then in 'The Great Key Mystery', Dora investigates the Great Key Mystery.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: 5.4.3.2.1. It's fairy o'clock - and the start of a fantastic festival, featuring rides, games, cotton candy and a new friend with a flower contest dream.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The children must walk to school in a walking bus! Miss Rabbit wears a high visibility jacket, leading Peppa and friends in a bus formation.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: At the playgroup, Madame Gazelle is reading a story, but a page is missing so she makes up an ending. During playtime, the children make up their own endings too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle is giving the playgroup a singing lesson, helped by Mummy Rhino on the piano. When the parents arrive, the children perform their song.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Today is the grown-ups' singing competition at the theatre and the kids are the judges. The children jump up and down and sing along. Everybody loves singing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben, Holly and their friends go on a snail trek with Miss Jolly.

channel.desc: Tim tries to keep Tia distracted when Tusky is in the washing machine.

channel.desc: Dora and Boots have to get a picture of a rare bird for Abuela in 'Catch The Quickatoo', then in 'Lost Lorito', Dora and Boots return a baby parrot home, who can't stop copying Boots.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington and Robot Paddingtron enjoy being heroes in 'Paddington and Paddingtron's Heroic Day', then in 'Paddington's Heroic Non-Stop Adventure', Paddington discovers how to be calm.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: When the Gabby Cats get stuck in the leaves of an overgrown cupcake tree, it's up to Gabby, Pandy and cupcake-expert Cakey to work together to save CatRat.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is bedtime and Peppa calls Kylie Kangaroo and is surprised to learn it's not morning or winter where she is! Daddy Pig explains this using a big ball to represent the earth.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting an adventure park. Miss Rabbit is in charge, and they have fun working their way around an obstacle course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family hire a canoe from Miss Rabbit. They imagine they are in a jungle and then actually bump into Mrs Crocodile. Then Mr Lion invites them to a picnic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family have gone on holiday, staying in a teeny tiny little holiday home near the beach. They discover that even when it rains, they can have lots of fun.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are going to the Water Park. Miss Rabbit is in charge. There are lots of fun things to do at the water park but first you need to put on your swimsuit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George have come to play at Granny and Grandpa's house. Everyone dresses as dinosaurs having lots of fun and a bit of a party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Pedro loves superheroes. He has a superhero-themed party and Super Potato is one of the guests.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and Suzy Sheep are spending a day helping Dr Hamster the Vet. They meet so many pets and have such fun.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Playgroup has a garden outside. The children are all having fun growing different plants and playing hide and seek in the wild wood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig and Grandad Dog take Peppa, George and Danny bowling. Peppa, George and Grandpa Pig have never been before.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit takes the children for swimming lessons in the little children's pool. At the end of the lesson, giant inflatables are brought out including an inflatable slide.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle teaches the playgroup to play the recorder. After lots of practice at home, they put on a concert for their parents.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig, Peppa and George have a wonderful day with Mr. Potato at Digger World.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Peppa gets Teddy dirty jumping in muddy puddles, she goes to The Doll Hospital.

channel.desc: Wendy Wolf's birthday is here and she has invited Peppa and friends around for a party.

channel.desc: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting Cousin Chloe's House to play with Baby Alexander. Peppa learns babies are not like dolls at all, and do lots of things every day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Peppa receives an invite to Candy Cat's birthday party - on a double decker bus.

channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George are in Granny and Grandpa Pig's Garden. Granny's friends are playing folk music! They play music for Grandpa Pig and then Grandpa Pig makes apple juice for everyone.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is bedtime and Peppa calls Kylie Kangaroo and is surprised to learn it's not morning or winter where she is! Daddy Pig explains this using a big ball to represent the earth.

channel.desc: Today is a special day because Mummy and Daddy Pig have big news to tell Peppa and George. However, Peppa and George struggle to wait patiently, so resort to playing games.
